Day1_Baha_JV: ^Lt Dover "Nothing much, as per usual. And sure thing.
^Officer JV "Captain Baha Blast.! It’s your favorite lead engineer.
^Officer JV "Ergo, your favorite. Got a minute to clear some pre-arrival checks?
^Officer JV "Copy. Our daily perimeter checks and gear assessments are all squeaky clean...
^Officer JV "But…the steering gear’s being a bit sticky.
^Cpt Baha "“Sticky”, is that the technical term for it?
^Officer JV "Oh absolutely. I need your “official permission” to cycle them through a cleaning and that oughta do the trick.
^Cpt Baha "You’ve already started it haven’t you?
^Officer JV "Don’t touch the helm for the next hour or we’ll all explode and die.
^Officer JV "Wow, Baha Blast. what’re you gonna do with all this free time? Got any sappy prose you need my highly attuned literary opinion on?
^Officer JV "Come on C.B., share your art with me!
^Cpt Baha "Maybe another time. Too many philistines on the bridge.
^Officer JV "Careful, Baha. You’re starting to sound like Ducksly.
^Officer JV "I gotta go. Steering will be back within the hour, everything’s fine!
Day1_Baha_Ducksly: ^Emperor Ducksly "quack Please, don’t call me that.
^Cpt Baha "Mhm. What can I do for you Ducksly?
^Emperor Ducksly "Captain, we’ve been over this. When someone greets you with Quackcelsior you’re supposed to-
^Cpt Baha "Ducksly, please get on with it.
^Emperor Ducksly "I was looking over the pre-arrival check-list you sent out and I noticed there was an item for medical check-ups on the crew.
^Emperor Ducksly "Well, it's just that the equipment that I would need is currently in use.
^Emperor Ducksly "Well, as our science officer, since our mission departure I thought I would be fruitful to conduct a bit of research.
^Cpt Baha "That’s nice and all, but we’re about to arrive. I’m sure you can spare some equipment from your “non-regulated research”.

^Emperor Ducksly "But, Captain! We’ve been traveling faster than light for the better part of a galactic year on our way to the Edge! How many species get to experience life at such speed? What does that do to a species' physiology?
^Cpt Baha "That’s fascinating Ducksly, it truly is. But -
^Emperor Ducksly "Exactly, Captain! I could be the first to know what happens to life at this scale. If I were to redistribute the equipment at this juncture, it would -
^Cpt Baha "Ducksly, please just get the medical checks done.
^Emperor Ducksly "Again, Captain, think of how our bodies all might’ve changed just over these few months.
^Cpt Baha "Ducksly! That’s not our mission. I’m sorry to say but your research is going to have to be put on pause.
^Emperor Ducksly "Captain, please I must ask you to reconsider! This is important to me, just as much as our mission is.
^Cpt Baha "How many times do I need to say this: but it’s not just about you. I need those check ups done. Alright?
^Emperor Ducksly "If J.V asked for some equipment for some smooth-brained project, you wouldn’t hesitate to grant her leniency!
^Cpt Baha "How about you let Officer Veldspar worry about her portion of the check-list and you worry about yours, Officer Ducksly. Get those checks done.
^Cpt Baha "The crew doesn’t just need these check ups. I need them. Ok?
Day1_PrivateConvoChoice: ^Cpt Baha "Comms Officer Dover, do you have a moment?
^Officer JV "Heyyy Dover, me again. You got a sec?
^Emperor Ducksly "Bonjour Dover. Might we have a tête-à-tête?
Day1_Post_Baha_Ducksly_Baha: ^Lt Dover "Guess I'll see how the Captain is doing.
^Cpt Baha "Dover. Thanks for picking up. I hope I'm not taking you away from your responsibilities.
^Lt Dover "No need to apologize Captain! Not much going on over here.
^Cpt Baha "Of course...You know how it is. Everyone's getting their Pre-arrival checks in.
^Lt Dover "Oh for sure, I can hear people running around.
^Lt Dover "Of course, because you can hear everything through the coms.

s: ^Oh No I can just hear them outside my door...
^That's right. I hear everything from my lair!

g-0: ^Cpt Baha "I'm sure you already know I talked to Ducksly not to long ago.
^Lt Dover "Yeah! How'd that go? they mentioned urgent business.
^Lt Dover "Hard to tell if something is acutally serious with that one sometimes.
^Cpt Baha "Apparently he's got too many experiments going on to actually start on his checklist.
^Lt Dover "Oh yeah they've been studying our bodies or something right?
^Cpt Baha "Either way... I shouldn't have to ask my science officer to do his job.

s: ^Wait. Don't their experiments kinda count as health check ups?
^Well, this is your ship Captain. You word is law.

Wait: ^Lt Dover "Well, like I said, they've been studying the conditions of our bodies.
^Lt Dover "And that means if something was wrong with one of our bodies they would've already notified you.
^Lt Dover "So doesn't that imply that you're checking up on the patients health condition as well?
^Lt Dover "Did you guys not realize that? That you were both on the same page?
^Cpt Baha "I guess you're right. But then there's the other problem.
Well: ^Cpt Baha "You're right. You know I don't like to be the bad guy. But we need to maintain order.
OtherProblem: ^Cpt Baha "Regardless of what I said before, Ducksly has displayed zero care for the ship or anyone on this crew.
^Lt Dover " Oh what! They're nice to me?
^Cpt Baha "Hmm. I just don't know what to do with him.
^Cpt Baha "I've served with a lot of hard heads over my career, but Ducksly...
^Cpt Baha "And he also has this weird rivalry with Officer Veldspar?

s: ^Maybe you should take interest in his Work? Might open him up a bit mroe?
^Inviting to our crew happy hours might be worth something.

Consider: ^Cpt Baha "Something to defintitely consider. Thank you Dover.
Day1_Post_Baha_Ducksly_JV: ^Lt Dover "Guess I'll see what's up with J.V.
^Lt Dover "Yup looks like I can squeeze you in.
^Officer JV "I'll only need a minute. I promise. Just wanted to vent about something.

g-0: ^Officer JV "All I'm saying is that the Captain should always be on call for his crew.
^Lt Dover "There will be other chances to call him Baha Blast.
^Officer JV "(Groans)You pass up the gig of a lifetime so you can stay on the ship of your favorite captain, the least he could do is answer.
^Lt Dover "Hey now he just didn't answer this one time, it's hardly the end of the world.
^Officer JV "It's not just this one time though
^Officer JV "Ever since we left on this mission he's been such a hardass.
^Lt Dover "To be honest I wouldn't want to be in the Captain's shoes.
^Officer JV "(chuckling)Yeah you'd look like a clown in them.
^Officer JV "But that's not all. We used ot be really close but now it's like he hardly wants to talk.
^Lt Dover "I'm sure you guys find time to chat.
^Officer JV "We do! And when we do it's great! But just getting him to chat is such a struggle now.
^Officer JV "I just want us to go back to being our little goon squad.

s: ^Sometimes people drift apart. Might be a sign to let go.
^You should tell him how you feel.

Day1_Post_BahaDucksly_JV_DistanceBAHA: ^Lt Dover "We're coming up on the literal end of everything. Why not?
^Officer JV "I guess I would just feel bad.
^Lt Dover "Don't! It happens. Not that you have to be mean. But you don't have to keep trying if he's not.
^Officer JV "That means I won't get to hear his bad writing (chuckles).
^Officer JV "But maybe you're right. Thanks Doverino!
Day1_Post_BahaDucksly_JV_ReconcileBAHA: ^Officer JV "That potentially creates conflict, so that's a big yikes for me.
^Officer JV "Did you not just hear me say-
^Lt Dover "I know what you said but we're about to reach the end of everything. Now's the perfect time to break bread.
^Lt Dover "How about this: What if when we reach the edge, and all that's there is a blank void inhabited by an incompressible space squid monster.
^Lt Dover "You wanna die on bad terms with the Captain in that scenario?
^Officer JV "You think there's a giant space squid monster?
^Lt Dover "What? No, it was... That's not the point J.V.
^Officer JV "No you're right. If there is a space squid monster, Baha and I will challenge it head on together.
Day1_BD_DB: ^Lt Dover "Alright Dover, prep yourself. Let's see what Ducksly wants.
^Emperor Ducksly "Thank you for taking time to speak with me Dover. I'llwont take too much of your time.
^Lt Dover "No worries, I've got nothing else going on anyways.
^Emperor Ducksly "I'm sure. Something has recently troubled me and I wanted to run my thoughts past someone.
^Emperor Ducksly "And since you're the only here I remotely trust with something like this I figured that someone would be you.
^Emperor Ducksly "It's about my recent conversation with the Captain.
^Emperor Ducksly "As I'm sure you know I've been conducting...

^Emperor Ducksly "Bonjour Dover, might you be so kind as to connect me with Captain Baha? Urgent business. Statistically, he's on the Bridge at this hour.
